pie.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 120 weight: @ 2 1
          # len: 3 ang: 135 weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: 150 weight: @ 1 1

na.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 60 weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: 45 weight: @ 1 2
          # len: 3 ang: 30 weight: @ 2 1

heng.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 1  weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: -1 weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: 1  weight: @ 1 1

shu.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 89 weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: 91 weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: 89 weight: @ 1 1

dian.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 30 weight: @ 1 1
          # len: 3 ang: 45 weight: @ 1 2
          # len: 3 ang: 60 weight: @ 2 1

zuodian.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 135
          # len: 3 ang: 120
          # len: 3 ang: 105

ti.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 0
          # len: 3 ang: -10
          # len: 3 ang: -10

wan.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 1 ang: 30
          # len: 3 ang: 70
          # len: 5 ang: 105

shupie.text:
# type: compound
  body: @ shu pie

  prog: @ # ith: 0
          # ith: 1 rotate: -30
                   curl: 9

-xieshuwan2.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 7 ang: 140
          # len: 1 ang: 70
          # len: 5 ang: 0
          # len: 0.3 ang: 0
          # len: 0.3 ang: -10
          # len: 0.3 ang: -10

-zhe-down.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 3 ang: 93
          # len: 3 ang: 93
          # len: 3 ang: 93

-gou-down.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 1 ang: 153
          # len: 1 ang: 153
          # len: 1 ang: 153

-gou-left.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 1 ang: -120
          # len: 1 ang: -135
          # len: 1 ang: -135

-gou-up.text:
# type: simple
  body: @ # len: 1 ang: -103
          # len: 1 ang: -102
          # len: 1 ang: -101

henggou.text:
# type: compound
  body: @ heng -gou-down
  prog: @ # ith: 1

hengzhegou.text:
# type: compound
  body: @ hengzhe- -gou-left
  prog: @ # ith: 1 curl: -3

hengzhezhe.text:
# type: compound
  body: @ heng shu heng

hengzhezhepie.text:
# type: compound
  body: @ hengzhe- heng pie
  prog: @ # ith: 1 scale: 0.6 rotate: 10
          # ith: 2 scale: 0.5

hengzhezhezhegou.text:
# type: compound
  body: @ hengzhe- heng pie -gou-left
  prog: @ # ith: 1 scale: 0.5 rotate: 10
          # ith: 2 scale: 0.5
          # ith: 3 rotate: -15

wogou.text:
# type: compound
  body: @ xiegou
  prog: @ # ith: 0 rotate: -10 curl: -20 scale: 1.2

女.text:
# type: radical
  body: @ piedian pie heng
  vars: # total-scale: # val: 1 range: # min:0.9 max: 1.2
          width: # val: 0 range: # min: 0 max: 1
          height: # val: 0 range: # min: 0 max: 1

          rot-0-0: "5+@'width'*3.2"
          sca-0-1: "0.3+@'width'*0.15"
          rot-0-1: "-@'width'*5"                           

  prog: @ # scale: total-scale
          # ith: 0
            prog: @ # ith: 0 rotate: rot-0-0
                      curl: -8 scale: "0.83-@'width'*0.1"
                    # ith: 1 scale: sca-0-1
                             rotate: rot-0-1
          # ith: 1 
            rotate: "-22.2+@'width'*4.3"
            scale:  "1.1+@'width'*0.2"
            prog: @ # ith: 0 curl: "20.7-@'width'*1.1"
          # ith: 2 scale: 1.25 rotate: 0
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: "0.4 -@'width'*0.1"
                     self: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: "0.65-@'width'*0.13"
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: "0.65+@'width'*0.11"
                     self: # ith: 1 curve: 0 r: 0.05

木.text:
# body: @ heng shu pie na
  type: radical
  prog: @ # ith: 0 scale: 1 rotate: 0 curl: 0
          # ith: 1 scale: 1 rotate: 0 curl: 0
          # ith: 2 scale: 1 rotate: 0 curl: 0
          # ith: 3 scale: 1 rotate: 0 curl: 0
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: cross-1-0-dest
                     self: # ith: 1 curve: 0 r: cross-1-0-self
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 1 curve: 0 r: cross-2-1-dest
                     self: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: 0
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: 0
                     self: # ith: 3 curve: 0 r: 0
  vars: # cross-1-0-self: # val: 0.200
                            range: # min: 0.100 max: 0.300
          cross-1-0-dest: # val: 0.500
                            range: # min: 0.400 max: 0.600
          cross-2-1-dest: # val: 0.200
                            range: # min: 0.100 max: 0.300

日.text:
# type: radical
  body: @ shu hengzhe heng heng
  prog: @ # ith: 1
            prog: @ # ith: 0 scale: scale-1-0
          # ith: 2 scale: scale-2
          # ith: 3 scale: scale-3
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: cross-2-0-dest
                     self: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: 0
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: 1
                     self: # ith: 3 curve: 0 r: 0
  vars: # scale-1-0: # val: 0.600
                       range: # min: 0.480 max: 0.750
          scale-2: # val: 0.400
                     range: # min: 0.320 max: 0.500
          scale-3: # val: 0.600
                     range: # min: 0.480 max: 0.750
          cross-2-0-dest: # val: 0.500
                            range: # min: 0.400 max: 0.600

月.text:
# type: radical
  body: @ shupie hengzhegou heng heng
  prog: @ # ith: 0
            scale: scale-0
            prog: @ # ith: 1 scale: scale-0-1
          # ith: 1
            prog: @ # ith: 0 scale: scale-1-0
                    # ith: 1 scale: scale-1-1
                    # ith: 2 scale: scale-1-2
          # ith: 2 scale: scale-2
          # ith: 3 scale: scale-3
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: cross-2-0-dest
                     self: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: 0
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 1 r: cross-3-0-dest
                     self: # ith: 3 curve: 0 r: 0
  vars: # scale-0: # val: 0.550
                     range: # min: 0.440 max: 0.688
          scale-0-1: # val: 0.900
                       range: # min: 0.720 max: 1.125
          scale-1-0: # val: 0.400
                       range: # min: 0.320 max: 0.500
          scale-1-1: # val: 1.100
                       range: # min: 0.880 max: 1.375
          scale-1-2: # val: 0.700
                       range: # min: 0.560 max: 0.875
          scale-2: # val: 0.270
                     range: # min: 0.216 max: 0.338
          scale-3: # val: 0.270
                     range: # min: 0.216 max: 0.338
          cross-2-0-dest: # val: 0.580
                            range: # min: 0.480 max: 0.680
          cross-3-0-dest: # val: 0.170
                            range: # min: 0.070 max: 0.270

目.text:
# type: radical
  body: @ shu hengzhe heng heng heng
  prog: @ # ith: 1
            prog: @ # ith: 0 scale: scale-1-0
                    # ith: 1 scale: 1
          # ith: 2 scale: scale-2
          # ith: 3 scale: scale-3
          # ith: 4 scale: scale-4
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: cross-2-0-dest
                     self: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: 0
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: cross-3-0-dest
                     self: # ith: 3 curve: 0 r: 0
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: 1
                     self: # ith: 4 curve: 0 r: 0
  vars: # scale-1-0: # val: 0.600
                       range: # min: 0.480 max: 0.750
          scale-2: # val: 0.420
                     range: # min: 0.336 max: 0.525
          scale-3: # val: 0.420
                     range: # min: 0.336 max: 0.525
          scale-4: # val: 0.600
                     range: # min: 0.480 max: 0.750
          cross-2-0-dest: # val: 0.330
                            range: # min: 0.230 max: 0.430
          cross-3-0-dest: # val: 0.660
                            range: # min: 0.560 max: 0.760

世.text:
# type: radical
  body: @ heng shuzhe shu shuzhe
  prog: @ # ith: 0 scale: scale-0
          # ith: 1
            prog: @ # ith: 0 scale: scale-1-0
                    # ith: 1 scale: scale-1-1
          # ith: 2 scale: scale-2
          # ith: 3
            prog: @ # ith: 0 scale: scale-3-0
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: cross-1-0-dest
                     self: # ith: 1 curve: 0 r: cross-1-0-self
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 1 curve: 1 r: 1
                     self: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: 1
          # cross: # dest: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: cross-3-0-dest
                     self: # ith: 3 curve: 0 r: cross-3-0-self
  vars: # scale-0: # val: 1.500
                     range: # min: 1.200 max: 1.875
          scale-1-0: # val: 0.880
                       range: # min: 0.704 max: 1.100
          scale-1-1: # val: 0.400
                       range: # min: 0.320 max: 0.500
          scale-2: # val: 0.880
                     range: # min: 0.704 max: 1.100
          scale-3-0: # val: 1.100
                       range: # min: 0.880 max: 1.375
          cross-1-0-self: # val: 0.500
                            range: # min: 0.400 max: 0.600
          cross-1-0-dest: # val: 0.450
                            range: # min: 0.350 max: 0.550
          cross-3-0-self: # val: 0.300
                            range: # min: 0.200 max: 0.400
          cross-3-0-dest: # val: 0.200
                            range: # min: 0.100 max: 0.300

牛.text:
# type: radical
  body: @ pie heng shu heng
  vars: # scale-0: # val: 0.480
                     range: # min: 0.384 max: 0.600
          rotate-0: # val: -15
                      range: # min: -35 max: 5
          scale-1: # val: 0.900
                     range: # min: 0.720 max: 1.125
          scale-2: # val: 1.400
                     range: # min: 1.120 max: 1.750
          scale-3: # val: 1.200
                     range: # min: 0.960 max: 1.500
          cross-0-1-self: # val: 0.500
                            range: # min: 0.400 max: 0.600
          cross-2-1-self: # val: 0.300
                            range: # min: 0.200 max: 0.400
          cross-2-1-dest: # val: 0.500
                            range: # min: 0.400 max: 0.600
          cross-3-2-self: # val: 0.500
                            range: # min: 0.400 max: 0.600
          cross-3-2-dest: # val: 0.600
                            range: # min: 0.500 max: 0.700
  prog: @ # ith: 0 scale: scale-0 rotate: rotate-0
          # ith: 1 scale: scale-1
          # ith: 2 scale: scale-2
          # ith: 3 scale: scale-3
          # cross: # self: # ith: 0 curve: 0 r: cross-0-1-self
                     dest: # ith: 1 curve: 0 r: 0
          # cross: # self: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: cross-2-1-self
                     dest: # ith: 1 curve: 0 r: cross-2-1-dest
          # cross: # self: # ith: 3 curve: 0 r: cross-3-2-self
                     dest: # ith: 2 curve: 0 r: cross-3-2-dest
